attributes.action: Standardise titles for men and women.
attributes.additional_details: As an adult, a woman's title varies depending on her marital status in a way that a man's does not.  Varying values and assumptions are attached to these titles in such a way as to label women in a discriminatory manner.  It is unnecessary.
attributes.background: All adult females should have the default title of 'Mrs' in the same way adult males have the default title of 'Mr'.  A woman's title should not be determined by her marital status, but instead by her transition into adulthood.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the titles that people choose to use.

You could start a new petition about the options that people are given on government forms.
